Title: Valid credentials - successful login
Steps: Enter valid email | Enter valid password | Click on 'Login' button | User is redirected to the dashboard
Expected: User is successfully logged in and redirected to their dashboard

Title: Invalid credentials - login failure
Steps: Enter invalid email | Enter valid password | Click on 'Login' button | Error message is displayed
Expected: An error message is displayed for invalid credentials

Title: Invalid email - login failure
Steps: Enter valid password | Enter invalid email | Click on 'Login' button | Error message is displayed
Expected: An error message is displayed for invalid email

Title: Invalid password - login failure (1st attempt)
Steps: Enter valid email | Enter invalid password | Click on 'Login' button | Error message is displayed
Expected: An error message is displayed for invalid credentials

Title: Invalid password - login failure (2nd attempt)
Steps: Enter valid email | Enter invalid password | Click on 'Login' button | Error message is displayed
Expected: An error message is displayed for invalid credentials

Title: Invalid password - account lock (3rd attempt)
Steps: Enter valid email | Enter invalid password | Click on 'Login' button | Account is locked for 10 minutes
Expected: Account is locked for 10 minutes after 3 incorrect login attempts

Title: Reset password - email sent
Steps: Click on 'Forgot Password' link | Enter email | Click on 'Submit' button | Email with reset link is received
Expected: An email with a reset password link is received

Title: Invalid email - reset password failure
Steps: Click on 'Forgot Password' link | Enter invalid email | Click on 'Submit' button | Error message is displayed
Expected: An error message is displayed for invalid email

Title: Valid email - reset password link invalid
Steps: Click on received reset link | Enter new password | Click on 'Submit' button | Error message is displayed
Expected: An error message is displayed for an invalid or expired reset link

Title: Valid email - successful password reset
Steps: Click on received reset link | Enter new password | Confirm new password | Click on 'Submit' button | Password is successfully reset

Title: Account unlock - wait for 10 minutes
Expected: The account is automatically unlocked after 10 minutes

Title: Login after account unlock
Steps: Enter valid email | Enter new password | Click on 'Login' button | User is successfully logged in and redirected to their dashboard
Expected: User is successfully logged in and redirected to their dashboard
